trans-unit.source: Instructs [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to disable the mandatory processing of headers not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders*> collection that must be understood according to the SOAP 1.1 and 1.2 specifications.
trans-unit.target: 指示[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]禁用标头不在强制处理<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders*>必须按照 SOAP 1.1 和 1.2 规范解释的集合。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders*>

trans-unit.source: By default the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] client or service runtime throws an exception when it encounters a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName> in a message for which the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true` but the header is not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the message.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]客户端或服务运行时将引发异常，在遇到时<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>为其消息中<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性是`true`但标头不在<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName>消息属性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To prevent this behavior, use the MustUnderstandBehavior and set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止此行为，请使用 MustUnderstandBehavior 并设置<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is used in scenarios where the message content is meant to be relayed somewhere else and not processed, such as a router service.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，这用在方案用于其他地方，并未处理，如路由器服务中继消息内容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior"></xref> class using the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior"></xref>类使用指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Pass `false` as the `validate` parameter to this constructor to prevent an exception from being thrown when the runtime encounters a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName> in a message for which the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true` but the header is not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the message.
trans-unit.target: 传递`false`作为`validate`为了防止出现异常引发运行时在遇到此构造函数参数<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>为其消息中<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性是`true`但标头不在<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName>消息属性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether to enforce validation of <xref uid="langword_csharp_mustUnderstand" name="mustUnderstand" href=""></xref> headers.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，指定是否强制执行的验证<xref uid="langword_csharp_mustUnderstand" name="mustUnderstand" href=""></xref>标头。

trans-unit.source: Supports behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: 支持行为功能。

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A> to support behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A>可支持行为功能。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to which the behavior applies.
trans-unit.target: 该行为所应用到终结点。

trans-unit.source: The binding parameters for the behavior.
trans-unit.target: 行为的绑定参数。

trans-unit.source: Assigns the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand*> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime.ValidateMustUnderstand*> property.
trans-unit.target: 将的值分配<> *1> 到<> *1> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%2A> method to support behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%2A>方法可支持行为功能。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to which the behavior applies.
trans-unit.target: 该行为所应用到终结点。

trans-unit.source: The client runtime to set.
trans-unit.target: 客户端运行时设置。

trans-unit.source: Assigns the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand*> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchRuntime.ValidateMustUnderstand*> property.
trans-unit.target: 将的值分配<> *1> 到<> *1> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A> to support behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A>可支持行为功能。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to which the behavior applies.
trans-unit.target: 该行为所应用到终结点。

trans-unit.source: The dispatcher to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的调度程序。

trans-unit.source: Supports behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: 支持行为功能。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%2A> method to support behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%2A>方法可支持行为功能。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的终结点。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to ensure that a header is understood according to the SOAP 1.1 and 1.2 specifications.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定是否确保按照 SOAP 1.1 和 1.2 规范理解标头。

trans-unit.source: Set the ValidateMustUnderstand property to `false` to prevent an exception from being thrown when the runtime encounters a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName> in a message for which the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true` but the header is not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the message.
trans-unit.target: 将 ValidateMustUnderstand 属性设置为`false`为了防止出现异常时运行时遇到引发<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>为其消息中<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性是`true`但标头不在<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName>消息属性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the header must be correctly processed or a fault is thrown; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果必须正确处理标头否则会引发错误;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
